Detailed Description

Definition at line 31 of file F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_StoreUploadedFiles.php.

Member Function Documentation

F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_StoreUploadedFiles::moveUploadedFiles (  )  [protected]

Moves uploaded files from temporary upload folder to a specified new folder. This enables you to move the files from a successful submission to another folder and clean the files in temporary upload folder from time to time.

TypoScript example:

1. Set the temporary upload folder and set cleaning plugin.F3_MailformPlusPlus.settings.files.clearTempFilesOlderThanHours = 24 plugin.F3_MailformPlusPlus.settings.files.tmpUploadFolder = uploads/mailformplusplus/tmp

2. Set the folder to move the files to after submission plugin.F3_MailformPlusPlus.settings.finishers.1.class = F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_StoreUploadedFiles plugin.F3_MailformPlusPlus.settings.finishers.1.config.finishedUploadFolder = uploads/mailformplusplus/finishedFiles/

Returns:
void
Author:
Reinhard Führicht <rf@typoheads.at>
